doc.after: Wikinews reporters have conducted interviews with several notable people including an interview in December 2007 with Israeli President Shimon Peres by Wikinews reporter David Shankbone Shankbone had been invited to conduct the interview by the America Israel Friendship League and the Israeli foreign ministry 10 11
